section.p: At the back of a cliff-lined bay on Udai Island stands a shrine dedicated to the worship of the Moonrise Clan’s ancestral spirits.

Priests in white robes come down to the beach to meet you. They are armed with moon spades - poles with a shovel-shaped blade on one end, a scythe on the other. Their vows are supposed to prohibit them from shedding blood, but they will fight to defend the shrine.

choices.choice: Make an offering to the spirits
